<static> apply_constraint(pivot_type, obj_a, trans_a, quat_a, obj_b, trans_b, quat_b, limits, stiffness, damping)

Apply physics constraint. there is no way to undo applied constraint of this type
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
pivot_type Pivot type
obj_a Object ID A
trans_a Translation of pivot frame relative to A
quat_a Rotation of pivot frame relative to A
obj_b Object ID B
trans_b Translation of pivot frame relative to B
quat_b Rotation of pivot frame relative to B
limits Object containting constraint limits
stiffness <optional>
 null 6-dimensional vector with constraint stiffness
damping <optional>
 null 6-dimensional vector with constraint damping
Source:
  • ext/physics.js, line 530
